member_organisations:
Members are individuals, with their CVs and photos posted on the EHFF website. A number represent organisations but are members of EHFF in their own right. 
EHFF has associated member status with a number of European organisations e.g. ECHAlliance, EHMA, EFPC and is a founder member of ENOPE., with which it is currently  formal affiliated. It has recently taken on a caretaker role for the European Society for Quality in Healthcare until ESQH becomes financially viable.
fields_of_interest: Budget, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Health for Growth 2014-2020 e.g. Chrodis Plus JA 
EIP for AHA 
Horizon 2020
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The European Health Futures Forum an open interactive network, which seeks out, processes and exchanges knowledge and information in real time to influence the future of health and healthcare in Europe and provide a better understanding of future possibilities for healthier lives and communities.
relevant_communication:
On steering group of one DG-SANTE tender related to patient empowerment and self-management about to complete 
 
Active in the EIP AHA, both within B3 (integrated care) and convening cross-action group activity (e.g. synergies group) 
 
Just completed involvement in one work package on H2020 project subject: empowerment of patients via ICT- PCP approach in 4 regions. 
 
Advisor to new H2020 project Compar-EU
